document_data.name: Teleport Trigger
document_data.Effects: The psionicist chose a specific trigger that would cause them to ''teleport'' safely away to a predetermined location without conscious effort on their end when the trigger was met. In order for the ''teleport trigger'' to work the psionicist needed to have enough psychic energy to satisfy the power at the time of the trigger.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
